title: Eternal teleport crystal

properties.name: description
properties.value: The eternal teleport crystal is an item that can be used to teleport to Lletya and Prifddinas, in a similar fashion to the teleport crystal, but with infinite charges.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Attuned crystal teleport seed
Eternal teleport crystal
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties

EquipableNo
StackableNo
OptionsLletya, Prifddinas

Weight0.001 kg
Advanced data
Item ID23946

The eternal teleport crystal is an item that can be used to teleport to Lletya and Prifddinas, in a similar fashion to the teleport crystal, but with infinite charges.

Players can create an eternal teleport crystal via a singing bowl by combining an enhanced crystal teleport seed and 100 crystal shards. Doing so requires level 80 Smithing and Crafting to sing the crystal (the levels can be boosted), and grants 5,000 experience in both skills. If the player does not meet the Smithing and Crafting requirements, they can have Conwenna or Reese sing the crystal for them for an extra 50 crystal shards, for a total of 150.

2 April 2020
(update)

Eternal teleport crystals are now prioritised over a greater selection of other items upon death.

[[File:Eternal teleport crystal detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''eternal teleport crystal''' is an item that can be used to teleport to [[Lletya]] and [[Prifddinas]], in a similar fashion to the [[teleport crystal]], but with infinite charges.

Players can create an eternal teleport crystal via a [[singing bowl]] by combining an [[enhanced crystal teleport seed]] and 100 [[crystal shard]]s. Doing so requires level 80 [[Smithing]] and [[Crafting]] to [[crystal singing|sing]] the crystal (the levels can be [[Temporary skill boost|boosted]]), and grants 5,000 experience in both skills. If the player does not meet the Smithing and Crafting requirements, they can have [[Conwenna]] or [[Reese]] sing the crystal for them for an extra 50 crystal shards, for a total of 150.
